restore.title: Obnoviť
restore.no_results_text: Select a backup and insert at least 4 characters, then press Search
restore.too_many_results: Your search has produced {0} results. Try to reduce the results changing the pattern. (Max results: 500)
restore.error_restored_list: There was an error restoring the items.
restore.backup_disabled: This backup is disabled. Enable it before restore data.

dashboard.title: Restore data dashboard
dashboard.no_backups_found_desc: It seems that you have not configured any backup-data

docs.override_restore:
• If checked the restored items will overwrite the current item.
  • If not checked the restored items will be created in the same path with date included in the name and .restore prepended (es. .restore-20190729-153318-myitem).
docs.choose_mode:
• Files or directories: Search only file and directories
  • Mail folders: Search only email folders
  • Advanced: Search everything (supports wildcards)
